### Introduction
Welcome to the "APP Predicted Tooth Growth in Guinea Pigs", that is developed as part of Developing Data Products Course from Coursera.

It is a very basic APP that demonstrates basic skills learned during the course.

The app uses the dataset "ToothGrowth" from R dataset.

### Getting Started with this Web App
One Side of the App let's you to select the variables i.e the dose level of Vitamin C and other the way the Vitamin was provided to Pigs.

First a model is build and the model is used for predicting the tooth data selected by the end user.

Please select/change the respective Inpput variables to view the change.

Source code for ui.R and server.R files are available on the GitHub.
